derivation: feminine of H376 (אִישׁ) or H582 (אֱנוֹשׁ); irregular plural, נָשִׁים;(used in the same wide sense as H582 (אֱנוֹשׁ))
outline:
1. woman, wife, female
    1. woman (opposite of man)
    2. wife (woman married to a man)
    3. female (of animals)
    4. each, every (pronoun)
kjv_def: (adulter) ess, each, every, female, [idiom] many, [phrase] none, one, [phrase] together, wife, woman. Often unexpressed in English.
